p: During the West Africa outbreak, experimental drug treatment of patients was also reported. Palich and co-workers [ 67] reported the survival of a 6 year old child diagnosed with EVD after treating with favipiravir (or T-705) until virus was cleared from his blood. The use of favipiravir in children older than 1 year has been suggested by Bouazza and co-workers [ 75], but data from ongoing trails are not yet available.
